title.narrative: Gas and Oil Capacity Building Project

description.narrative: The project objective is to (i) improve public management and regulatory capacity while enhancing transparency; and (ii) strengthen local technical skills in Ghana's emerging oil and gas sector.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V.1 | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than December 31, 2015 cause KNUST torecruit, pay and maintain laboratory technicians, and provide an adequate budget for running the petroleum engineering laboratory.| Due Date :31-Dec-2015

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V.2 | Description :The Recipient shall: (a) not later than June 30, 2015 cause EPA torecruit, pay and maintain laboratory technicians, including providing an adequate budget for running the EPA Western Region office;and (b) not later than June 30, 2015 ensure that EPA has made the necessary arrangements to staff the marine vessel financed underthe Project, and at all times during the implementation of the Project | Due Date :30-Jun-2015
Finance Agreement :Section V.A.1 | Description :GoG makes $1 million available to KNUST for completion of the building for housingthe lab equipment | Due Date :31-May-2012

Finance Agreement :Section V.B.1 | Description :KNUST to reduce staff-student ratio for BS program in petroleum engineering from1:47 in 2010 Academic Year to 1:18 by the Closing Date | Due Date :30-Jun-2015

Finance Agreement :Section V.B.2 | Description :KNUST to recruit, pay and maintain laboratory technicians and provide adequatebudget for running the petroleum engineering laboratory | Due Date :31-Dec-2015

Finance Agreement :Section V.C. | Description :EPA to (a) recruit, pay, and maintain laboratory technicians and provide adequatebudget for Western Region, and (b) staff the marine vessel and provide adequate operating budget | Due Date :30-Jun-2015
